verses.verse: רַנְּנ֣וּ <WH7442> ran-ne-Nu Rejoice צַ֭דִּיקִים <WH6662> Tzad-di-kim O ye righteous בַּֽיהוָ֑ה <WH3068> Yah-weh; in the LORD לַ֝יְשָׁרִ֗ים <WH3477> lay-sha-Rim, for the upright נָאוָ֥ה <WH5000> na-Vah is comely תְהִלָּֽה׃ <WH8416> te-hil-Lah. [for] praise

הוֹד֣וּ <WH3034> ho-Du Praise לַיהוָ֣ה <WH3068> Yah-weh the LORD בְּכִנּ֑וֹר <WH3658> be-chin-Nor; with harp בְּנֵ֥בֶל <WH5035> be-Ne-vel unto him with the psaltery עָ֝שׂ֗וֹר <WH6218> a-Sor, [and] an instrument of ten strings זַמְּרוּ־ <WH2167> zam-me-ru- sing לֽוֹ׃ lo.

שִֽׁירוּ־ <WH7891> shi-ru- Sing ל֭וֹ lo שִׁ֣יר <WH7892> shir song חָדָ֑שׁ <WH2319> cha-Dash; unto him a new הֵיטִ֥יבוּ <WH3190> hei-Ti-vu skilfully נַ֝גֵּ֗ן <WH5059> nag-Gen, play בִּתְרוּעָֽה׃ <WH8643> bit-ru-'Ah. with a loud noise

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- for יָשָׁ֥ר <WH3477> ya-Shar [is] right דְּבַר־ <WH1697> de-var- For the word יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> Yah-weh; of the LORD וְכָל־ <WH3605> ve-chol and all מַ֝עֲשֵׂ֗הוּ <WH4639> ma-'a-Se-hu, and all his works בֶּאֱמוּנָֽה׃ <WH530> be-'e-mu-Nah. [are done] in truth

אֹ֭הֵב <WH157> 'O-hev He loveth צְדָקָ֣ה <WH6666> tze-da-Kah righteousness וּמִשְׁפָּ֑ט <WH4941> u-mish-Pat; and judgment חֶ֥סֶד <WH2617> Che-sed of the goodness יְ֝הוָ֗ה <WH3068> Yah-weh of the LORD מָלְאָ֥ה <WH4390> mal-'Ah is full הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> ha-'A-retz. the earth

בִּדְבַ֣ר <WH1697> bid-Var By the word יְ֭הוָה <WH3068> Yah-weh of the LORD שָׁמַ֣יִם <WH8064> sha-Ma-yim were the heavens נַעֲשׂ֑וּ <WH6213> na-'a-Su; made וּבְר֥וּחַ <WH7307> u-ve-Ru-ach of them by the breath פִּ֝֗יו <WH6310> Piv, of his mouth כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all צְבָאָֽם׃ <WH6635> tze-va-'Am. and all the host

כֹּנֵ֣ס <WH3664> ko-Nes He gathereth כַּ֭נֵּד <WH5067> Kan-ned together as an heap מֵ֣י <WH4325> mei the waters הַיָּ֑ם <WH3220> hai-Yam; of the sea נֹתֵ֖ן <WH5414> no-Ten he layeth up בְּאֹצָר֣וֹת <WH214> be-'o-tza-Rot in storehouses תְּהוֹמֽוֹת׃ <WH8415> te-ho-Mot. the depth

יִֽירְא֣וּ <WH3372> yi-re-'U fear מֵ֭יְהוָה <WH3068> Yah-weh the LORD כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all הָאָ֑רֶץ <WH776> ha-'A-retz; Let all the earth מִמֶּ֥נּוּ <WH4480> mi-Men-nu at יָ֝ג֗וּרוּ <WH1481> ya-Gu-ru, stand in awe כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all יֹשְׁבֵ֥י <WH3427> yo-she-Vei let all the inhabitants תֵבֵֽל׃ <WH8398> te-Vel. of the world

כִּ֤י <WH3588> ki for ה֣וּא <WH1931> hu He אָמַ֣ר <WH559> 'a-Mar For he spake וַיֶּ֑הִי <WH1961> vai-Ye-hi; done הֽוּא־ <WH1931> hu- He צִ֝וָּ֗ה <WH6680> tziv-Vah, and it was [done] he commanded וַֽיַּעֲמֹֽד׃ <WH5975> Vai-ya-'a-Mod. and it stood fast

יְֽהוָ֗ה <WH3068> Yah-weh The LORD הֵפִ֥יר <WH6331> he-Fir to nought עֲצַת־ <WH6098> 'a-tzat- the counsel גּוֹיִ֑ם <WH1471> go-Yim; of the heathen הֵ֝נִ֗יא <WH5106> he-Ni, of none effect מַחְשְׁב֥וֹת <WH4284> mach-she-Vot the devices עַמִּֽים׃ <WH5971> 'am-Mim. of the people

עֲצַ֣ת <WH6098> 'a-Tzat The counsel יְ֭הוָה <WH3068> Yah-weh of the LORD לְעוֹלָ֣ם <WH5769> le-'o-Lam for ever תַּעֲמֹ֑ד <WH5975> ta-'a-Mod; standeth מַחְשְׁב֥וֹת <WH4284> mach-she-Vot the thoughts לִ֝בּ֗וֹ <WH3820> lib-Bo, of his heart לְדֹ֣ר <WH1755> le-Dor to all וָדֹֽר׃ <WH1755> va-Dor. generations

אַשְׁרֵ֣י <WH835> 'ash-Rei Blessed הַ֭גּוֹי <WH1471> Hag-goy [is] the nation אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> 'a-Sher- whose יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> Yah-weh [is] the LORD אֱלֹהָ֑יו <WH430> 'e-lo-Hav; whose God הָעָ֓ם׀ <WH5971> ha-'Am [and] the people בָּחַ֖ר <WH977> ba-Char [whom] he hath chosen לְנַחֲלָ֣ה <WH5159> le-na-cha-Lah for his own inheritance לֽוֹ׃ lo.

מִ֭שָּׁמַיִם <WH8064> Mish-sha-ma-yim from heaven הִבִּ֣יט <WH5027> hib-Bit looketh יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> Yah-weh; The LORD רָ֝אָ֗ה <WH7200> ra-'Ah, he beholdeth אֶֽת־ <WH853> 'et- כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> be-Nei all the sons הָאָדָֽם׃ <WH120> ha-'a-Dam. of men

מִֽמְּכוֹן־ <WH4349> mi-me-chon- From the place שִׁבְתּ֥וֹ <WH3427> shiv-To of his habitation הִשְׁגִּ֑יחַ <WH7688> hish-Gi-ach; he looketh אֶ֖ל <WH413> 'el on כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all יֹשְׁבֵ֣י <WH3427> yo-she-Vei upon all the inhabitants הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> ha-'A-retz. of the earth

הַיֹּצֵ֣ר <WH3335> hai-yo-Tzer He fashioneth יַ֣חַד <WH3162> Ya-chad alike לִבָּ֑ם <WH3820> lib-Bam; their hearts הַ֝מֵּבִ֗ין <WH995> ham-me-Vin, he considereth אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- about כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all מַעֲשֵׂיהֶֽם׃ <WH4639> ma-'a-sei-Hem. all their works

אֵֽין־ <WH369> 'ein- else הַ֭מֶּלֶךְ <WH4428> Ham-Me-lech There is no king נוֹשָׁ֣ע <WH3467> no-Sha' saved בְּרָב־ <WH7230> be-rov- by the multitude חָ֑יִל <WH2428> Cha-yil; of an host גִּ֝בּ֗וֹר <WH1368> gib-Bor, a mighty man לֹֽא־ <WH3808> lo- is not יִנָּצֵ֥ל <WH5337> yin-na-Tzel is not delivered בְּרָב־ <WH7230> be-rov- by much כֹּֽחַ׃ <WH3581> Ko-ach. strength

שֶׁ֣קֶר <WH8267> She-ker [is] a vain thing הַ֭סּוּס <WH5483> Has-sus An horse לִתְשׁוּעָ֑ה <WH8668> lit-shu-'Ah; for safety וּבְרֹ֥ב <WH7230> u-ve-Ro [any] by his great חֵ֝יל֗וֹ <WH2428> chei-Lo, strength לֹ֣א <WH3808> lo Nor יְמַלֵּֽט׃ <WH4422> ye-mal-Let. neither shall he deliver

הִנֵּ֤ה <WH2009> hin-Neh Behold עֵ֣ין <WH5869> 'ein Behold the eye יְ֭הוָה <WH3068> Yah-weh of the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to יְרֵאָ֑יו <WH3373> ye-re-'Av; [is] upon them that fear לַֽמְיַחֲלִ֥ים <WH3176> lam-ya-cha-Lim him upon them that hope לְחַסְדּֽוֹ׃ <WH2617> le-chas-Do. in his mercy

לְהַצִּ֣יל <WH5337> le-hatz-Tzil To deliver מִמָּ֣וֶת <WH4194> mi-Ma-vet from death נַפְשָׁ֑ם <WH5315> naf-Sham; their soul וּ֝לְחַיּוֹתָ֗ם <WH2421> u-le-chai-yo-Tam, and to keep them alive בָּרָעָֽב׃ <WH7458> ba-ra-'Av. in famine

נַ֭פְשֵׁנוּ <WH5315> Naf-she-nu Our soul חִכְּתָ֣ה <WH2442> chik-ke-Tah waiteth לַֽיהוָ֑ה <WH3068> Yah-weh; for the LORD עֶזְרֵ֖נוּ <WH5828> 'ez-Re-nu he [is] our help וּמָגִנֵּ֣נוּ <WH4043> u-ma-gin-Ne-nu and our shield הֽוּא׃ <WH1931> Hu. Him

כִּי־ <WH3588> ki- Because ב֭וֹ vo יִשְׂמַ֣ח <WH8055> yis-Mach shall rejoice לִבֵּ֑נוּ <WH3820> lib-Be-nu; For our heart כִּ֤י <WH3588> ki Because בְשֵׁ֖ם <WH8034> ve-Shem name קָדְשׁ֣וֹ <WH6944> ka-de-Sho in his holy בָטָֽחְנוּ׃ <WH982> va-Ta-che-nu. in him because we have trusted

יְהִֽי־ <WH1961> ye-hi- Let חַסְדְּךָ֣ <WH2617> chas-de-Cha Let thy mercy יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> Yah-weh O LORD עָלֵ֑ינוּ <WH5921> 'a-Lei-nu; as כַּ֝אֲשֶׁ֗ר <WH834> ka-'a-Sher, we יִחַ֥לְנוּ <WH3176> yi-Chal-nu be upon us according as we hope לָֽךְ׃ Lach.
